steps: Defeat the encountered fiendish demons
walkthrough: Head to the Pit of Screams: Dangerous Area
There are 9 enemies which spawn in the room
- LV70 Drake or Lindwurm x1 (Hidden Treasure) (1pp)
- LV70 Witch x3 (Hidden Treasure) (1pp each)
- LV70 Strix x5 (Hidden Treasure) (1pp each)
The following loot bag treasure was observed being picked up by the player when fighting Lindwurm:
- 4500 gold x3
- 4500 gold x2, 2000 gold x1
- 4500 gold x2, 2000 gold x1, Premium Cocoa Powder x1, Magick-Tinged Bone x2
- 4500 gold x2, 2000 gold x1
- 4500 gold x2, Orb of Darkness x1, Magick-Tinged Bone x2
- 4500 gold x2, Premium Cocoa Powder x1
- 4500 gold x2, 2000 gold x1
- 4500 gold x2, Dragon Hide x2, Premium Cocoa Powder x1
- 4500 gold x2, Orb of Darkness x1, Magick-Tinged Bone x2
The videos show 2 random rewards, but the video does not go to the reward box to collect them.
